headline: SBA Communications Corporation to Speak at the BofA Securities 2024 Leveraged Finance Conference
summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., November 19, 2024--SBA Communications Corporation (NASDAQ: SBAC) ("SBA") announces that Marc Montagner, Chief Financial Officer, is scheduled to speak at the BofA Securities 2024 Leveraged Finance Conference, Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 4:10 PM (ET). The conference will be at The Boca Raton in Boca Raton, Florida. The audio presentation for SBA can be accessed by visiting www.sbasite.com.
